text: Henry Ivison Shipley Thirlaway (9 August 1917 – 30 November 2009) was a British seismologist. He did extensive work on the monitoring of underground nuclear testing. He was awarded the Gold Medal of the Royal Astronomical Society in 1972. ==External links== *Hal Thirlaway: seismologist Times Online obituary *Hal Thirlaway obituary from the Guardiian Category:1917 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Recipients of the Gold Medal of the Royal Astronomical Society Category:British seismologists
title: Hal Thirlaway
